calendar.p: The Julian calendar, as used in England before 1752. The year starts on March 25.

A Hebrew calendar dating from the creation of the world, based on biblical genealogy. The start date varies according to the biblical texts used. Here, based on the dates given for the same events in other formats, this calendar starts in 3962 BC.
A calendar dating from the Roman discovery of Britain. Based on the dates given for the same events in other formats, this calendar starts in 50 BC.

body.ab:
The maner of Offeringe
ffirst the Chiefe Mowrner to offer alone for the defunct
beinge attended on by the Assisstantes. The Chiefe
mowrner to tarry still at the Commvnion Table to receave
the Hachmentes. The Assistantes to goe backe to the
Hearse.
ffirst to be offered the Coate of Armes.
Then the Sworde.
The the Targe.
Then the Helme & Creaste.
The then Penon
Then the Standarde.
Then the Chiefe Mowrner to be broought downe & after
a little pawse to offer for hymselfe.
Then the .4. Assistantes (if he be a knighte
The Gentillmen in Gownes.
Then Gentillmen Cloakes
Then to retowrne backe in proceadinge home in order
asthey came to the Churche flourish .Bro:/
The nobility placed acordinge to theire
Creation degrees & after the Auncienty of
theire Creations .1577.
